nodes.text: Lynna were a felinoid species native to the largely undiscovered planet of Livno III in the galaxy's Wild Space.

The Lynna homeworld of Livno III was too far away from any source of sunlight and was facing  ruin, but they were saved by an ancient group called The Architects through the construction of Breeze, Rain, and Solstice Globes. Together, these globes powered a machine which regulated the planet's environment within a partially underground chamber called the Chamber of the Sun.

During the Imperial Era, Zel Gris had told the princess of Hynestia and the daughter of Queen Forsythia Jin of the Solstice Globe's unique properties that could save her homeworld Livno III, Rinetta was convinced it must be returned and formulated a plan to help Gris steal it. Gris was caught while fleeing the planet, alongside Lando Calrissian, who was arrested for unrelated smuggling crimes. When Calrissian and L3-37 were ordered by Rinetta's mother to deliver the globe to the Galactic Empire, they instead returned the Solstice Globe to Livno III, saving the planet.
